notable_rules: Nisarg layout parity with thrivethroughtime.com baseline structure.
Warm premium editorial palette (gold + ivory neutrals) with deep blue photo accents.
Content typography tuned for larger body/headings and tighter line-height.
Classic-theme WordPress compatibility via Code Snippets front-end injection.

illustration_style.editorial_direction: Business coaching editorial scenes in photorealistic style, premium and human-centered, aligned with Thrive Through Time mood.
illustration_style.rendering: Photorealistic editorial photography look, natural light, soft depth of field, realistic skin tones, no synthetic cartoon rendering.
illustration_style.composition: One clear human scene with secondary context, crop-safe for WordPress cards and wide headers, balanced negative space.
illustration_style.mood: Trustworthy, practical, expert, optimistic, calm and publication-ready.
motifs: coach and client reviewing plans on laptop
small advisory group discussion around a table
financial planning and growth dashboard moments
human with subtle AI-assistant support context

style_notes: Style transferred from thrivethroughtime.com to lesnewsducoach.com via wordpress-style-director.
Use gold accents on warm neutral backgrounds and deep blue cues for premium consistency.
Article visuals must be photorealistic, human-centered, and crop-safe for cards and headers.
